name: BRICKLE: Classic Brick Breaker
description:
BRICKLE is the THE BEST CLASSIC BRICK BREAKER ON THE APP STORE.


Featuring 4 Game Modes;

- ARCADE : Pass as many boards as you can. Be careful, as you will go back all the way to the first board if you run out of lives. Tip: Buy power-ups with your coins.

- LEVELS : You must pass 10 boards to advance to the next level.

- SURVIVAL : Can you survive against the falling bricks? Only pro players can succeed ;)

- RETRO : Retro look, retro sounds!

LEVEL EDITOR INCLUDED ;)

HAS THE MOST ORIGINAL & FUN POWER-UPS
